• ault
   1 # -*- coding=utf-8 -*-
   2 from __future__ import absolute_import, print_function, unicode_literals
   3 
   4 import click
   5 
   6 from . import __version__
   7 from .pythonfinder import Finder
   8 
   9 
  10 @click.command()
  11 @click.option("--find", default=False, nargs=1, help="Find a specific python version.")
  12 @click.option("--which", default=False, nargs=1, help="Run the which command.")
  13 @click.option("--findall", is_flag=True, default=False, help="Find all python versions.")
  14 @click.option(
  15     "--version", is_flag=True, default=False, help="Display PythonFinder version."
  16 )
  17 @click.option(
  18     "--ignore-unsupported/--no-unsupported",
  19     is_flag=True,
  20     default=True,
  21     envvar="PYTHONFINDER_IGNORE_UNSUPPORTED",
  22     help="Ignore unsupported python versions.",
  23 )
  24 @click.version_option(prog_name="pyfinder", version=__version__)
  25 @click.pass_context
  26 def cli(
  27     ctx, find=False, which=False, findall=False, version=False, ignore_unsupported=True
  28 ):
  29     if version:
  30         click.echo(
  31             "{0} version {1}".format(
  32                 click.style("PythonFinder", fg="white", bold=True),
  33                 click.style(str(__version__), fg="yellow")
  34             )
  35         )
  36         ctx.exit()
  37     finder = Finder(ignore_unsupported=ignore_unsupported)
  38     if findall:
  39         versions = [v for v in finder.find_all_python_versions()]
  40         if versions:
  41             click.secho("Found python at the following locations:", fg="green")
  42             for v in versions:
  43                 py = v.py_version
  44                 comes_from = getattr(py, "comes_from", None)
  45                 if comes_from is not None:
  46                     comes_from_path = getattr(comes_from, "path", v.path)
  47                 else:
  48                     comes_from_path = v.path
  49                 click.secho(
  50                     "{py.name!s}: {py.version!s} ({py.architecture!s}) @ {comes_from!s}".format(
  51                         py=py, comes_from=comes_from_path
  52                     ),
  53                     fg="yellow",
  54                 )
  55             ctx.exit()
  56         else:
  57             click.secho(
  58                 "ERROR: No valid python versions found! Check your path and try again.",
  59                 fg="red",
  60             )
  61     if find:
  62         click.secho("Searching for python: {0!s}".format(find.strip()), fg="yellow")
  63         found = finder.find_python_version(find.strip())
  64         if found:
  65             py = found.py_version
  66             comes_from = getattr(py, "comes_from", None)
  67             if comes_from is not None:
  68                 comes_from_path = getattr(comes_from, "path", found.path)
  69             else:
  70                 comes_from_path = found.path
  71             arch = getattr(py, "architecture", None)
  72             click.secho("Found python at the following locations:", fg="green")
  73             click.secho(
  74                 "{py.name!s}: {py.version!s} ({py.architecture!s}) @ {comes_from!s}".format(
  75                     py=py, comes_from=comes_from_path
  76                 ),
  77                 fg="yellow",
  78             )
  79             ctx.exit()
  80         else:
  81             click.secho("Failed to find matching executable...", fg="yellow")
  82             ctx.exit(1)
  83     elif which:
  84         found = finder.system_path.which(which.strip())
  85         if found:
  86             click.secho("Found Executable: {0}".format(found), fg="white")
  87             ctx.exit()
  88         else:
  89             click.secho("Failed to find matching executable...", fg="yellow")
  90             ctx.exit(1)
  91     else:
  92         click.echo("Please provide a command", color="red")
  93         ctx.exit(1)
  94     ctx.exit()
  95 
  96 
  97 if __name__ == "__main__":
  98     cli()
